thread.title: BRIEF-iFresh Signs Letter Of Intent To Acquire 75 Pct Of Fujian Fuding Seagull Fishing Food

title: BRIEF-iFresh Signs Letter Of Intent To Acquire 75 Pct Of Fujian Fuding Seagull Fishing Food

organizations.name: fujian fuding seagull fishing food reuters
fujian fuding seagull fishing food  ifresh signs letter of intent to acquire

text: iFresh Signs Letter Of Intent To Acquire 75 Pct Of Fujian Fuding Seagull Fishing Food Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 20 (Reuters) - iFresh Inc: * IFRESH, INC. SIGNS LETTER OF INTENT TO ACQUIRE 75% OF FUJIAN FUDING SEAGULL FISHING FOOD CO., LTD. * IFRESH INC - DEAL SET AT A LEVEL OF APPROXIMATELY 525 MILLION RMB, WITH A COMBINATION OF CASH AND STOCK​ * IFRESH INC - ‍EXPECTS TO SIGN A DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT WITHIN 90 DAYS​ Source text for Eikon:
